reviewText:
It's a shame that Désirée Rancatore is not better known
this side of the Atlantic. I bought this recital after buying,
-with Amazon-, her rending of Salieri's  'Europa Riconosciuta',
a master-piece by Beethoven's and Schubert's professor of harmony
(a better title, than Mozart's enemy...) There, she is as astonishing
as the tenor Giuseppe Sabattini (another poorly known star) Not so,
Diana Damrau who completes the trio.
